author: ANDREW DALTON
title: Oscar-nominated 'MASH' actor Sally Kellerman dies at 84
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Sally Kellerman, the Oscar and Emmy nominated actor who played Margaret “Hot Lips” Houlihan in director Robert Altman's 1970 film “MASH," died Thursday. Kellerman died of heart failure at her home in the Woodland Hills section of Los Angele…
